attributes.action: Restrict the use of fireworks to annual locally approved organised displays.
attributes.additional_details:
Posted by RSPCA Official  
Published on 5 May 2016 under Animal welfare, Campaigns. Tags: action, Email MP, Fireworks, New year
Share
276
Imagine being terrified of something.
Imagine not knowing when that thing is going to come and scare you, so that you can’t anticipate it or know how to cope with it. Imagine that thing scaring you every night for over two weeks…

This is the reality for many animals who are frightened of fireworks.
attributes.background:
I have to watch my pet dog either petrified to the point of actual paralysis or convulsed with spasms each year between September and January as a result of exploding fireworks.
 A&E visits caused by fireworks are now above 5000 per year and rising exponentially.
Fireworks sales need regulating.
